question:
you work from home and you a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job


write a letter to the shop that supplied the equipment to you.
text: A very good day to you. I, am Prabjot Singh, a regular customer of your shop. I purchased a wifi device from your shop wide bill number 123 dated 21/04/2022. I am writing this letter in regards to applying for a return procedure as per your recovery policy.

I am currently working from home due to the covid 19 crisis.Moreover, I have no transport facility available, so that I can personally visit at your place to rebound the equipment. This piece of material is very essential for me in order to continue my work at my place, as I would be not able to connect my internet connection with my laptop.
Furthermore, I think there is a technical issue with the device. I shall be very thankful to you, if you arrange a new wifi router for 2/1 Krishna Nagar, Ludhiana where currently I am staying.
